rows.label: tev000701_MSG1001
rows.name: How am I supposed to handle this by myself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG1002
rows.name:
Oh, don't mind me.
Go on ahead to the BLADE barracks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG1003
rows.name:
There's a transport pilot just down this way. Ask him,
and he'll take you to the administrative district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hiya, [ST:playername ]. You're not busy?
Then we should team up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0002
rows.name:
Between the two of us, I bet we could bring down
some pretty big game! What do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Doug to your team.

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Doug's request for now.

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0003
rows.name: All right, now we're talking! Let's go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Not up for that today, huh?
Still, you DO know I'm right, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0009
rows.name: You have a mission to explore Noctilum, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0010
rows.name:
Looks like it pays pretty well, too. So how about it?
Got room for me on your team?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0031
rows.name: Add Doug to your team.

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0041
rows.name: Decline Doug's request for now.

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0011
rows.name: All right, now we're talking! Let's go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0012
rows.name:
That's a shame. But if any more good assignments
come your way, keep me in mind, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0017
rows.name: So now it's an expedition to Oblivia, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0018
rows.name:
I heard that area is rife with tyrants, and real tough
ones, too. Probably be a good idea to have a
specialist on your team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0019
rows.name:
If you don't have one yet, I happen to be available.
So what do you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0051
rows.name: Add Doug to your team.

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0061
rows.name: Decline Doug's request for now.

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0020
rows.name: All right, now we're talking! Let's go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0021
rows.name:
Well, just so long as you got a good team watching
out for you. Best of luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0026
rows.name:
I've been hearing rumors about some unbelievably
powerful monster out in the heart of Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0027
rows.name:
But if Lao's going with you, you should be safe.
That guy could take down anything with a single
well-placed shot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0031
rows.name: They say Irina's team got hit by the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0032
rows.name:
We need to go save her. I know she looks tough,
but she's got a bit of a careless streak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0033
rows.name:
And honestly, I don't know that Gwin is up for it.
We'd better do the rescue ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0071
rows.name: Add Doug to your team.

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline Doug's request for now.

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0034
rows.name:
Great, I'm ready when you are.
Get your things together and let's go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0035
rows.name:
Okay, I'll leave this one to you.
Just make sure to bring her back safely, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0040
rows.name:
Lao's still being worked on in the maintenance center.
Sounds like it'll be a while before he's back in
fighting shape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0041
rows.name:
Whaddya say we go clear out the Mission Control
backlog so he doesn't have a damn thing to do once
he's finally back on duty?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0091
rows.name: Add Doug to your team.

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0101
rows.name: Decline Doug's request for now.

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0042
rows.name: All right, now we're talking! Let's go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0043
rows.name: You sure? Well, maybe I'll go pay the guy a visit, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0048
rows.name:
Lao's still being worked on in the maintenance center.
Sounds like it'll be a while before he's back in
fighting shape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0049
rows.name:
If you're going all the way out to Sylvalum,
could you maybe let me tag along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0111
rows.name: Add Doug to your team.

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline Doug's request for now.

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0050
rows.name: All right, now we're talking! Let's go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0051
rows.name:
Well, just so long as you have a good team watching
out for you. Best of luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0056
rows.name:
I need to be the one to do it. I need to stop him with
my own two hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0057
rows.name:
You understand that, right?
Then you gotta take me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0131
rows.name: Add Doug to your team.

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline Doug's request for now.

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0058
rows.name:
If a friend's about to make a terrible mistake, I will risk
my life to stop them. That's what friends do, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0059
rows.name:
That's your final decision? ...Well, okay then.
I guess I'm counting on you to stop him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0064
rows.name: Thanks for saving Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0065
rows.name:
I feel like I owe you one. Can I help out with your next
mission or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0151
rows.name: Add Doug to your team.

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline Doug's request for now.

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0066
rows.name:
Thanks! I'll help out in any way that I can.
You just say the word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0067
rows.name:
I understand. But if you ever find yourself shorthanded,
my offer still stands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0072
rows.name:
We made it through all the rehearsals, and now it's
finally showtime![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0073
rows.name:
If I could be of some use to you, just say the word.
I'll give you every last drop of strength that I've got![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0171
rows.name: Add Doug to your team.

rows.label: tev000701_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000701_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline Doug's request for now.

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0074
rows.name:
When this battle's finally done, I'm buying Lin 10 cups
of hot chocolate from that caf√© she likes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0075
rows.name:
Well, just so long as you have a good team watching
out for you. Best of luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0080
rows.name:
Hopefully that dumbass will be able to come back
to his old body soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0081
rows.name:
And then I'll be able to help him atone for all the
suffering he's caused.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0082
rows.name:
But until then, I'll have plenty of free time on my hands.
Wanna take me somewhere? I'll go wherever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0083
rows.name: All right, now we're talking! Let's go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000701_MSG0084
rows.name:
Well, just so long as you have a good team watching
out for you. Best of luck![ST:wait ]
